name: Love Quest (see brews  games)
description:
this game has been in development for a long time it's actually one of my vary early projects, that said it's been on the backburner too long  and still could use some work. I hope you enjoy my first try at an open-world design. 

you play the role of a lonely man new to the area and help the young ladies you find.

there are multiple endings if you download the ROM

computer  controllers :  

up (arrow up, w) 

down (arrow down, s)

left (arrow left, a)

right(arrow  right , d)

A (alt, z, j)

B (control, k, x) 

start (Enter)

select (shift)
